# Mansion (Building)
## Overview
**Mansion**

**Create** 132 Goods, 4 Influence, 120 Labor (5,160 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 4 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedrooms]], 1 [[Escape Route (Room)|Escape Route]], 2 Furnishings ([[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]] and [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]]), 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Laundry (Room)|Laundry]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Lodging (Room)|Lodging]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Room]], 2 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Rooms]], 1 [[Stall (Room)|Stall]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

A huge manor housing a rich family and its servants.
